item.title: What your texts say about you
item.description: Introduction Processing Patterns Parsing Analysis Pet words Overall word usage Word usage by member Word usage made better ‚åö 4‚É£ üòÇüòãüòç Popular emojis and chronic roflitis Let‚Äôs put a smiley on that face Emoji to word ratio Getting sentient about sentiments Conclusion Introduction Without data, you‚Äôre just an another person with an opinion - W. Edwards Deming We all have intuitions, questions or even hypotheses if you will about people‚Äôs texting patterns.

item.title: Unweaving Happiness
item.description: Introduction A word of warning if you are reading from a mobile Setup Data Munging Missing Adding Continents Exploration Happiness levels Standard Deviation of happiness Correlation Analysis GDP‚Äôs relationship Healthy Life Expectancy Social Support Prediction Setup Modeling Model Selection Testing our model/Diagnostics Best and Worst Predictions Conclusion Introduction The World Happiness Report 2018 by United Nations Sustainable Development Solutions Network (SDSN) based on data from the Gallup World Poll surveys was out a few days ago.

item.title: The Statistically Significant Four
item.description: Why the big 4 deserve all the praise they get‚Ä¶ We all know tennis is a competitive sport. Winning one slam is hard so much so that it is probably enough. In the chart below, you might recognize a few of those small bars in the far right - Roger Federer with 19 grand slam titles, Rafa with 16 and so on. But try to recollect five people who constitute the single big bar on the left hand side - people who have won just one slam!

Polarity mark.pos { background-color: lightgreen; color: black; } mark.neg{ background-color: pink; color: black; } h1 { display: block; font-size: 1.2em; margin-top: 0.0em; margin-bottom: 0.0em; margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; font-weight: bold; } .indented { margin-left: 5%; margin-right: 5%; } 1_The movie was horrible: -.375The movie was horrible 2_The movie was not good at all: -.283The movie was not good at all 3_The movie was okay: .000The movie was okay
